Query.SQL: set dateformat dmy; SELECT Row ,[User_ID] ,[User_Name_T] ,[User_Name_E] ,[User_Password] ,[User_Person_ID] ,[User_Birthdate] ,[User_Tel] ,[User_Email] ,[User_Count_False] ,[User_Lock_Status] ,[Start_Date] ,[End_Date] ,convert(date,[Create_Date],102) as Create_Date ,[Create_By] ,[Update_Date] ,[Update_By] FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY User_ID) as Row ,[User_ID] ,[User_Name_T] ,[User_Name_E] ,[User_Password] ,[User_Person_ID] ,[User_Birthdate] ,[User_Tel] ,[User_Email] ,[User_Count_False] ,[User_Lock_Status] ,[Start_Date] ,[End_Date] ,[Create_Date] ,[Create_By] ,[Update_Date] ,[Update_By] FROM [MS_User]) a

Query.SQL: SELECT a.Row ,a.Item_ID ,a.Loc_ID ,d.Loc_Name_T ,a.Asset_Type_ID ,c.Asset_Type_Name_T ,a.Asset_ID ,b.Asset_Name1_T ,a.Serial_No ,a.Asset_Loc ,a.Owner ,a.Quality ,a.Tranfer_Loc ,a.Budget_Year ,a.Document_No ,a.Document_Date ,a.Fund_Type_ID ,e.Fund_Type_Name_T ,a.Standard_Price ,a.Price_per_unit ,a.Purchase_Doc_no ,a.Purchase_Doc_date ,a.Brand ,a.Serie ,a.Receive_from ,a.Mvt_ID ,f.Mvt_Name_T ,a.Term_Use ,a.Depriciate_accru ,a.Depriciate_in_year ,a.Net_Price ,a.Create_Date ,a.Create_By ,a.Update_Date ,a.Update_By FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY Loc_ID) as Row ,[Item_ID] ,[Loc_ID] ,[Asset_Type_ID] ,[Asset_ID] ,[Serial_No] ,[Asset_Loc] ,[Owner] ,[Quality] ,[Tranfer_Loc] ,[Budget_Year] ,[Document_No] ,[Document_Date] ,[Fund_Type_ID] ,[Standard_Price] ,[Price_per_unit] ,[Purchase_Doc_no] ,[Purchase_Doc_date] ,[Brand] ,[Serie] ,[Receive_from] ,[Mvt_ID] ,[Term_Use] ,[Depriciate_accru] ,[Depriciate_in_year] ,[Net_Price] ,[Create_Date] ,[Create_By] ,[Update_Date] ,[Update_By] FROM [MS_Asset_Detail]) a left outer join MS_Asset b on b.Asset_ID = a.Asset_ID left outer join MS_Asset_Type c on c.Asset_Type_ID = a.Asset_Type_ID left outer join MS_Work_Center d on d.Loc_ID = a.Loc_ID left outer join MS_Fund_Type e on e.Fund_Type_ID = a.Fund_Type_ID left outer join MS_Movement_Type f on f.Mvt_ID = a.Mvt_ID
